quest.name: Pilfered Podlings
journal: Voyce has made a monumental discovery.

The pseudoscholar Voyce has belatedly come to the conclusion that the sylphs who had captured him are in possession of a podling containing the Chosen One. As he neither understands the full implications of this nor possesses the courage to investigate the matter himself, he bids you speak with Olmxio.

Aghast at hearing that the Chosen One is in the hands of the touched sylphs, Olmxio urges you to go in search of the podling at once, casting a spell of transparency upon you to aid in your quest. Infiltrate the Sylphlands and spy upon any ill-intentioned sylphs you might find, that you might ascertain the location of the Chosen One's podling.

※This task must be completed before Olmxio's enchantment expires. To extend the length of his spell, interact with the fragrant blooms you encounter on your path.

To your fortune, the heedless sylph tasked with transporting the Chosen One's podling has misplaced his charge somewhere near the entrance to the Sylphlands. Hurry and find it before the touched ones do!

You have secured the podling, which is a great deal weightier than you imagined. Transport it safely back to Little Solace while the strength in your arms remains.

※To bolster your strength while carrying the podling, interact with the patches of moongrass that you find along the way.
The Chosen One's podling now rests safely in Little Solace. Inform Voyce that you were able to succeed in the task without his help.
While relieved that the Chosen One is safe, Elder Frixio does not believe that the touched ones will give up so easily, and warns you that retaliation may come sooner than you think.
objectives: While transparent, spy on the touched sylphs.
Deliver the sylph podling to Little Solace.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Friend, you must listen! I was just perusing my tomes before, when I came across a most fascinating passage.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Are you perchance familiar with how baby sylphs are born? Perhaps I can put it in layman's terms. You see, sylphs come into this world in the form of a bulb, not unlike certain types of flora.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: But these bulbs will not sprout into a sylph of their own volition. No, they must first be incubated within a special pod─forming what is known as a “podling”─and given sufficient warmth and nutrition. Then, and only then, will a newborn sylph emerge.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: This got me to thinking... Those frightful sylphs who accosted me said something about a podling, yes? I didn't put it together then, but...

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Yes, surely the Chosen One slumbers as a podling even as we speak...a podling which they assumed I had come to steal! This must be why they acted so threatened by my presence!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: We should continue our search in the Sylphlands straightaway. That is to say, you should continue it. I mean, I'd go with you, of course! It's just, uh... <cough> <cough> ...Still feel so weak... <cough> Ahem. I'm sure Olmxio would agree. You should go see what he thinks.

dialogue.name: OLMXIO
dialogue.text: Bumbling one said what!? Chosen One yet exists as a podling? Why did bumbling one not tell this one sooner!? There is no time to lose!

dialogue.name: OLMXIO
dialogue.text: Walking one must become running one, and retrieve Chosen One's podling from the Sylphlands with all haste!

dialogue.name: OLMXIO
dialogue.text: This one can help. This one uses see-through magic, so that walking one becomes hidden one.

dialogue.name: OLMXIO
dialogue.text: But be careful─see-through magic will not last long. If touched ones see walking one, walking one is in trouble. Now hurry, and find Chosen One!

dialogue.name: DECRIPT
dialogue.text: A sylphic incantation is about to render you transparent. Hurry and find the bulb that houses the slumbering Chosen One before the magic is lifted.

dialogue.name: DECRIPT
dialogue.text: The incantation will expire in fifty seconds. If you become visible, you will be unable to complete your goal. Return to Olmxio and have the spell cast anew.

dialogue.name: DECRIPT
dialogue.text: The fragrant blooms you will encounter on the way will extend the duration of the incantation. Seek them out if the spell's power begins to wane.

dialogue.name: RECOVER
dialogue.text: A fragrant mist envelops you!

dialogue.name: NOTRECOVER
dialogue.text: （カット）

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It is not safe to perform this action while visible. Return to Olmxio to have the incantation cast anew.

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYA
dialogue.text: Phew, this one is exhausted! Who knew that a podling could be so heavy?

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYB
dialogue.text: (-Irritable Sylph-)Lazy one should feel honored, to be trusted by boss one with super-secret mission!

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYA
dialogue.text: Yes, yes...this one is honored, but also tired. So this one hides podling in super-secret place, will carry to boss one when arms and wings are strong again.

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYB
dialogue.text: (-Irritable Sylph-)But boss one said not to let podling out of sight for even one eye-blink!

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYA
dialogue.text: Yes, yes... This one was just going to go get it... Now, ah...where did this one put it, again?

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYB
dialogue.text: (-Irritable Sylph-)...

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYA
dialogue.text: Was it near entrance to these ones' home, or...? Ah, this one cannot remember! Oh, what has this one done!? Boss one will pluck this one's wings out one by one!

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYB
dialogue.text: (-Sluggish Sylph-)These ones must search! If these ones do not find Chosen One quickly, this one will not survive boss one's wrath!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Cool, crisp air fills your lungs, giving your arms and legs new strength!

dialogue.name: NOTRECOVER
dialogue.text: You are not carrying the specified object. Return to the starting point and reattempt the delivery.

dialogue.name: DECRIPT
dialogue.text: Carry the podling back to Little Solace while your arms and legs still have strength.

dialogue.name: DECRIPT
dialogue.text: You will have fifty seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: DECRIPT
dialogue.text: Be wary of attacks from enemies. Should you find yourself tiring, seek out patches of moongrass, which will restore your strength.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Could it truly be...the Chosen One's podling? Good show, friend!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Why, it is every bit as beautiful as I would have expected from the tales, and thrice the size!

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: Brave one has done it! These ones cannot thank brave one enough!

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: By keeping Chosen One out of the hands of touched ones, brave one has saved these ones─no, every one in Eorzea─from a thundery demise!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Oh, let us not engage in hyperbole, friend sylph! Chosen One or no, she is just a wee babe, after all.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: Foolish one has four eyes, yet not a one of them sees!

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: Has foolish one learned nothing from those paper stacks? From the moment Chosen One emerges from cradle, Chosen One holds the power of a thousand thousand of these ones.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: ...Power to command primal one with the ease by which walking ones draw breath.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: What does four-eyed one think would happen if Chosen One's powers fell into hands of touched ones? Lord Ramuh would come down from the heavens, and walking ones' precious Gridania would go boom!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: A primal in Gridania!? H-How frightful! Why, we really must do something about this!

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: Does four-eyed one need four ears as well!? That is why this one sent brave one in search of Chosen One! <sigh>

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: What matters is that Chosen One is safe now. Under these ones' care, Chosen One will be raised in Little Solace, where Chosen One will know only peace and gentleness.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: If raised properly, Chosen One's great powers will bring comfort and solace, not destruction. This one─all of these ones─will see to that.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: But brave one must be wary. These ones' enemy will not give up so easily. Should touched ones return for Chosen One, this one would ask for brave one's aid.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: I say, it's one eye-opening experience after the next with these sylphs! I really must take all this down... Now, where did I put my journal?

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMYA
dialogue.text: Phew! This one needs a─hm? Walking one!? Walking ones are not welcome in this place!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Recognized reputation with the sylphs of Little Solace.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New sylph tribal daily quests are now available from Ponnixia at Little Solace.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from the sylphic vendor.
